name: NSWindow.TabbingMode
desc: The preferred tabbing behavior of a window.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A window that automatically tabs together based on the userâ€™s tabbing preference.

items.name: case disallowed
items.desc: A window that explicitly does not prefer to tab together with other windows.

items.name: case preferred
items.desc: A window that explicitly prefers to tab together with other windows with the same tabbing identifier.
